title: STERA:  In Case You Missed It
post:
“And here after so many centuries the forgotten image reappears suddenly on the Shroud’s fabric with a terrible truthfulness, with the authenticity not only of an irrefutable document, but of a present fact. The nineteen centuries interval is suddenly erased; the past is transferred to the present. ”
Beautifully said by Historian Luigi Fossati
author: Mike M

title: STERA:  In Case You Missed It
post:
During a recent bible study our group decided to dissect the available information information
on the Shroud .  A curiosity arose when we sort of ran out of all evidence and speculations
and we focused on the shin a “E” symbol on the forehead often suggested as a run of AB
blood precipitated by the crown of thorns. Upon using a HD photo image with a series of
enlargements or zooms we captured the image of a crucified man on a cross head turned
to the right.
author: David larson
